page.title: 19CUSTOMS
page.content: Every year Liphook has a carnival, guides, scouts, youth clubs and young wives all dress up and have a float. Usually from Bohunt a Carnival Queen is chosen and 2 carnival princesses. Some one famous usually comes and judges the floats. There is a cup for whoever wins first prize. There also is a second and third prize. The carnival is at the end of October. There are gas balloons and hot dogs for sale. Also there is a marching band and majorettes. Along the Headley Road is a field where there is a huge bonfire with a guy and fireworks. The rest is a fair, stalls and ghost trains.
